name: mapreduce.reduce.cpu.vcores
description:
The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for
  each reduce task.

name: dfs.client.server-defaults.validity.period.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds after which cached server defaults are updated.

    By default this parameter is set to 1 hour.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.

name: dfs.blockreport.intervalMsec
description: Determines block reporting interval in milliseconds.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.suspectnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing suspect node behavior.

name: mapreduce.task.exit.timeout
description:
The number of milliseconds before a task will be
  terminated if it stays in finishing state for too long.
  After a task attempt completes from TaskUmbilicalProtocol's point of view,
  it will be transitioned to finishing state. That will give a chance for the
  task to exit by itself.

name: dfs.balancer.service.retries.on.exception
description:
When the balancer is executed as a long-running service, it will retry upon encountering an exception. This
    configuration determines how many times it will retry before considering the exception to be fatal and quitting.

name: mapreduce.job.local-fs.single-disk-limit.check.interval-ms
description: Interval of disk limit check to run in ms.
